data.title: Secret Members Profile (Updated!)
data.meta_description: Our Secret Members Profile is updated on a regular basis, providing up to date facts and news.
data.text:
Secret Members Profile: Secret Facts, Secret Ideal Type

SECRET (ì‹œí¬ë¦¿) consisted of 2 members in the last part of their career: Hyosung and Hana. Sunhwa and Jieun left the group in 2016, and 2018 respectively. Hyosung left left the company in early 2018. SECRET debuted under TS Entertainment in 2009 and disbanded in 2018 after Hyosungâ€™s departure.

Secret Fandom Name: Secret Time

Secret Official fan Color: White

Hyosung facts:

â€“ She was born in Chungcheongbuk-do, South Korea.

â€“ She has a younger sister and an older sister.

â€“ As a 3rd grader, Hyosung and her family started delivering newspapers to get extra money.

â€“ In 6th grade, Hyosung decided she wanted to become a singer.

â€“ In middle school, she was the leader of her schoolâ€™s dance team.

â€“ In 2007, she was supposed to debut with G.NA, Yubin (Wonder Girls), UEE (After School), and Jiwon (SPICA) as girl group Five Girls but they disbanded pre-debut.

â€“ Sheâ€™s a member of the one time sub unit Dazzling RED with 4Minuteâ€™s Hyuna, KARAâ€™s Nicole, After Schoolâ€™s Nana, & SISTARâ€™s Hyorin.

â€“ On February 28, 2018, it was reported that Hyoseong was in legal disputes with her agency TS Entertainment.

â€“ The court decided that the exclusive contract between Hyoseong and TS Ent holds no validity.

â€“ On October 29, 2018 it was announced that Hyoseong signed with Tommy & Partners Entertainment.

â€“ Hyosungâ€™s ideal type: â€œKang Dong Won [is my ideal type]. I only look at personality and not at faces, and my ideal type is a man who can love me.â€

Hana facts:

â€“ She was born in Uijeongbu, Gyeonggi, South Korea.

â€“ She is an only child.

â€“ Her mother worked as a singer in the 1980s and her father worked as a bodyguard.

â€“ Her former stage name is Zinger.

â€“ She is close to EXIDâ€˜s LE.

â€“ She is also friends with 2NE1â€˜s CL and Wonder Girlsâ€˜ Sun while attending the same dance academy in middle school.

â€“ She acted in the drama â€œJumping Girlâ€ (2015).

â€“ Hana participated on â€œThe King of Masked Singerâ€ in May 2019.

â€“ She is the only Secret member who remained under TS Ent.

â€“ Hanaâ€™s ideal type: â€œFor me, itâ€™s Chu Sung Hoon I dream of a man who can be a ddal-babo (daughter-fool).â€

Jieun facts:

â€“ She was born in Seoul, South Korea.

â€“ She is an only child.

â€“ She auditioned for JYP at a young age and was supposed to debut with Hyorin (SISTAR) and U-JI (BESTie) but plans did not go well.

â€“ She acted on the Korean dramas: â€œFamilyâ€ (2012, cameo), â€œPure Loveâ€ (2013), â€œLonging for Springâ€ (2014), â€œThe Superman Ageâ€ (2015), â€œSweet Home, Sweet Honeyâ€ (2016), â€œMy Secret Romanceâ€ (2017), â€œMelting Me Softlyâ€ (guest â€“ 2019), â€œWish Woosh 2â€ (2019).

â€“ On February 28, 2018, Ji Eun has announced her departure from Secret on her Instagram.

â€“ On June 22, 2019 it was announced that Jieun signed with 6 Oceans.

â€“ Jieunâ€™s ideal type: â€œ[My ideal type] is Kim Soo Hyun. Itâ€™s almost an openly known fact. Iâ€™ve really liked him since I was a rookie.â€

Sunhwa facts:

â€“ She was born in Busan, South Korea.

â€“ She is the oldest in her family and had to tutor her younger siblings (a sister and a brother) when her parents worked.

â€“Victonâ€˜s Han Seungwoo is her younger brother.

â€“ When she was young she wanted to be an artist.

â€“ In 6th grade she watched a performance of BoA and immediately wanted to be a singer.

â€“ Her mother was only 20 when she had Sunhwa.

â€“ In 2012 she was paired with Kwanghee of ZE:A to be her husband on the TV show â€œWe Got Marriedâ€œ.

â€“ Sheâ€™s a member of the one-time sub unit Mystic WHITE with 4Minuteâ€™s Gayoon, KARAâ€™s Jiyoung, After Schoolâ€™s Lizzy, & SISTARâ€™s Bora.

â€“ She acted in several Korean dramas: â€œAd Genius Lee Tae-Baekâ€ (2013), â€œGodâ€™s Gift â€“ 14 Daysâ€ (2014), â€œMarriage Not Datingâ€ (2014), â€œRosy Loversâ€ (2015), â€œRadiant Officeâ€ (2017), â€œSchool 2017â€ (2017), â€œ20th Century Boy and Girlâ€ (2017), â€œMy Husband Oh Jak Dooâ€ (2018), â€œThe Great Seducerâ€ (guest â€“ 2018), â€œSave Me 2â€ (2019), â€œBackstreet Rookieâ€ (2020), â€œUndercoverâ€ (2021).

â€“ On Sep 25, 2016, TS Ent. announced Sunhwaâ€™s departure from the group.

â€“ On March 13, 2020, it was announced that Sunhwa has signed an exclusive contract with KeyEast Entertainment

â€“ Sunhwaâ€™s ideal type: â€œ[My ideal type] is Jo Seung Woo, who I did a drama with. It wasnâ€™t like this while we were filming the drama, but once the drama ended, I keep thinking of him.â€
